input.sentences: i found a photo album in my grandma 's attic .
it contained pictures of people i 've never met .
my grandma told me [female] was her mother .
it contained pictures and information on my entire family history .
it made me appreciate my family more .
output.sentences: We had to do a genealogy project for our history class.
The photographs are so interesting to study. It really shows the era they were taken during.
It looks like she really liked her cat, Mr. Whiskers.
We noticed that people didn't always smile big in photos like they do today.
It is interesting to see how the similarities in facial features remain generations later.
